name: Ogre
description:
Stop The Ogre In Its Tracks


Challenge the Ogre, a cybernetic supertank programmed to coldly annihilate anything in its path. Set on 21st century battlefields, this game of strategy is for either one or two players.

Conventional forces such as nuclear-armed tanks, speed vehicles, howitzers and infantry must be skilfully deployed to defend a command post. The composition and placement of units is critical in destroying the Ogre which has multiple weapon systems and trick armour plating.

Ogre is an adaption of the classic board game by Steve Jackson. It epitomizes simplicity and play balance, yet is far from simple to win. A game editor allows computer warriors to design their own wasteland battlefields, ensuring long-term player appeal.

    1-2 player strategy game
    Numerous programmed playfields
    Facility to design unlimited original playfields
    Various Ogre skill levels
    Menu driven for ease of use
    Superb sound effects
    1-2 hours of playing time
